channel.title: What type of server? I just don't know
channel.description:
Hey guys. I've been stuck in a decision. Would people like a storyline like server or an old-school server? I like both, I'm not sure which one would get more players.
Thanks, Arham

item.title: What type of server? I just don't know
item.dc:creator: @RS_PS RS PS
item.description:
@RS_PS wrote:

I once had a unique idea but I didn’t complete it just started it before I quit RSPS.

Anyways basically at the beginning you pick a class, Warrior, Archer, Magician
Now basically your XP for whichever class you pick is 10 and the other two are 5, you can increase if you want.
Now you have to create many quests or tasks for the class they pick and once they complete one it doubles there current XP then they can’t doing the quests/tasks of the other 2 classes that were unchosen they have to complete about 20 tasks/quests of the current class they picked but the other classes only adds 5 Extra XP on to your current one, And if you want to add more to it your choice.

If you want a better explanation just ask.

Read full topic
item.source: What type of server? I just don't know

@Loveandpower wrote:

^ true, I always found RS storylines to be messy and unorganized though. It would a lot neater if you could keep storylines in a category in quest list.

item.title: What type of server? I just don't know
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Carter_, post:11, topic:448563”]A storyline server that isn’t compulsory. So people can still play the generic old school way if they wish without being forced to follow a storyline.

Kind of like Skyrim.[/quote]

Or runescape. Runescape has many story lines.

Read full topic

item.title: What type of server? I just don't know
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“TiVo, post:5, topic:448563”]How about a storyline server that’s old school?

:sexyparrot:[/quote]
I’m not sure how I’d make that happen. The old school feel would only come from the gameframe, but I want it to come from the real feel. A real eco that makes the whole eco player based.

I, myself, am leading myself to OldSchool.

Read full topic
